mapper.select: SELECT c.DEPT_CD,b.pjt_cd,b.PLAN_A,b.PLAN_B,b.PLAN_C,b.PLAN_D, b.PLAN_E,b.PLAN_F,b.PLAN_G,TOT_MD FROM (SELECT pjt_cd, SUM(PLAN_A)AS PLAN_A,SUM(PLAN_B)AS PLAN_B,SUM(PLAN_C)AS PLAN_C, SUM(PLAN_D)AS PLAN_D,SUM(PLAN_E)AS PLAN_E,SUM(PLAN_F)AS PLAN_F, SUM(PLAN_G)AS PLAN_G, SUM(TOT_MD)AS TOT_MD FROM T_P11050 GROUP BY pjt_cd) b JOIN T_P11000 a ON a.pjt_cd=b.pjt_cd JOIN T_HM1000 AS c ON c.EMP_NO=a.EMP_NO
